patterns:
38 1XX$e Aggregator terms CAM
some $item in $ListVAgentEAggregators satisfies marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '1')]/marc:subfield[@code='e'][lower-case(.) = lower-case($item)]
-->
82 500List-POT 041$a$d Mult. lang. PAM
( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( some $item in $List500_520ParallelOnlyTerms_CaseNo satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='500']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., $item)] )
